About Bobby Schade

I started with web development in early 2019, shortly after I relocated from Cleveland, Ohio to Houston, Texas. Over time, I have become increasingly excited and motivated to learn more and improve my skills. I love knowing that nearly anything I can imagine to build is possible if I, or a team, commit to making it happen.

My work can be seen above as well as on my GitHub (link in footer). I am open for freelance work but am also eager to join a collaborative team solving interesting challenges.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy good music, television, and movies, as well as sports; I love playing tennis, basketball, golf, and ping-pong.
